description:
## About Tech Corp

Tech Corp is transforming how enterprises manage their cloud infrastructure. We're looking for a talented Senior Full Stack Engineer to join our growing Platform team.

## Role Overview

As a Senior Full Stack Engineer, you'll work on building scalable web applications that power our cloud management platform. You'll collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers to deliver features that delight our customers.

## What You'll Do

- Design and implement new features across our full stack (React, Node.js, PostgreSQL)
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and ship new features
- Mentor junior engineers and contribute to technical discussions
- Participate in code reviews and help maintain high engineering standards
- Optimize application performance and scalability
- Work with DevOps team to improve deployment processes

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Redux, Material-UI
- Backend: Node.js, Express, GraphQL
- Database: PostgreSQL, Redis
- Infrastructure: AWS, Kubernetes, Docker
- Tools: Git, GitHub Actions, DataDog, Sentry

required: 5+ years of professional software development experience
Strong proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and React
Experience building RESTful APIs and/or GraphQL services
Solid understanding of relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL)
Experience with modern development practices (Git, CI/CD, code review)
BS in Computer Science or equivalent experience
preferred: Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Experience in a high-growth startup environment

responsibilities: Develop and maintain full-stack web applications
Collaborate with product and design teams
Participate in technical planning and architecture decisions
Mentor and guide junior team members
Contribute to improving engineering processes and practices

benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance

team_info.collaboration: Work closely with Product, Design, and DevOps teams
